cocktails.name: Martini
cocktails.instructions: Stir gin and vermouth with ice. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Serve with a lemon twist or an olive.

cocktails.name: Gin and Tonic
cocktails.instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add gin and top with tonic water. Gently stir and garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Negroni
cocktails.instructions: Stir gin, Campari, and vermouth over ice. Strain into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Garnish with an orange peel.

cocktails.name: Tom Collins
cocktails.instructions: Shake gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup with ice. Strain into an ice-filled collins glass. Top with soda water and garnish with a lemon slice.

cocktails.name: Gimlet
cocktails.instructions: Shake gin, lime juice, and simple syrup with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Moscow Mule
cocktails.instructions: Fill a mule mug with ice. Add vodka and lime juice, then top with ginger beer. Stir gently and garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Bloody Mary
cocktails.instructions: In a shaker, combine vodka, tomato juice, lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce, and Tabasco. Shake gently. Strain into an ice-filled glass. Season with salt and pepper. Garnish with a celery stick.

cocktails.name: Screwdriver
cocktails.instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add vodka and top with orange juice. Stir gently.

cocktails.name: White Russian
cocktails.instructions: Fill an old-fashioned glass with ice. Pour vodka and coffee liqueur over ice. Add heavy cream and stir gently.

cocktails.name: Cosmopolitan
cocktails.instructions: Fill a shaker with ice. Add vodka, triple sec, cranberry juice, and lime juice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lime wheel or cranberries.
